snippet: Reports by OPEC and the Energy Department prompt a sell-off in oil markets.
abstract: Oil prices plunge and take stock market down with them, and three main market indexes fall 1.5 percent or more.
lead_paragraph: Reports by OPEC and the Energy Department prompt a sell-off in oil markets.

headline.main: Plunging Oil Prices Take Wall St. Lower
headline.print_headline: Plunging Oil Prices Take Wall St. Lower
